name: Harbiye Residence

reviews.text: I spent four nights at HR last week. I'm not sure there is much I can add to other reviews. This is a modern hotel; rooms are spacious and fitted with refrigerator and some cooking facilities; everything is very clean; a good "continental" breakfast spread is available each morning, with simple cooked dishes such as omelette also available.
reviews.title: Excellent value in central Istanbul

reviews.text: It is not possible to praise the staff too highly. Everyone is very warm and welcoming, nothing is too much trouble. They are outstanding.
reviews.title: much more value for money you pay

reviews.text: The hotel is not located in one of the hotspots for tourist accommodation (that is, Taksim or Sultanahmet) so there are not dozens of restaurants on the same block. However there are a few in the area, and plenty of small grocery shops that are open all hours.
reviews.title: Great hotel near Taksim!

reviews.text: The location is about fifty metres down a small steep side street off a main thoroughfare - Cumhuriyet Caddesi - between Taksim and Nisantasi, near the military museum and Macka Parki, and convenient for the Istanbul Conference Centre. It's a short walk to Nisantasi, a fashionable shopping and restaurant district mostly patronised by Istanbul residents, or to the transport and tourist hub of Taksim. Touristic visitors should be aware that the HR is some distance from the main tourist sites of the Topkapi peninsula (Ayasofya, blue mosque, bazaars) - although not much further than hotels in Taksim - and should expect either to spend some time walking or on public transport, or to take the occasional inexpensive taxi ride. If you have business in the area, it's an excellent location.
reviews.title: Nice and clean place with supportive reception

description: Harbiye Residence is located at the heart of the Istanbul city, one side close by just 5 minutes walking distance to the most famous Taksim Square and Istiklal Street which includes the most famous Pedestrian Street of Istanbul with lots of shopping places, art galleries, restaurants, pubs and bars. On other side has 5 minutes walking distance to the center of modern Istanbul, Nisantasi district which includes most popular high quality entertainment, shopping, national and international brands within walking distance also subway and Lutfu Kirdar (Istanbul) Congres Center.The comfortable and friendly atmosphere makes it a warm living place than a luxury hotel. Our friendly and experienced staff is ready to welcome you with simplicity and peace in your business and leisure travels in Istanbul.
